name: Huawei MateStation X
description: Huawei's all-in-one desktop computer, with a 27-inch 4K display, Intel Core i7-12700H processor, and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti graphics card.

name: Huawei MateBook X Pro

name: Huawei MateBook 14s
description: Huawei's latest ultra-thin laptop, with a 14.2-inch 2.5K display, Intel Core i7-12700P processor, and Windows 11.
